publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7177 Elizabeth Smith: The Education (Lower Primary Class Sizes) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Education (Lower Primary Class Sizes) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 (SSI 2010/326).

S3M-7177 Elizabeth Smith: The Education (Lower Primary Class Sizes) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Education (Lower Primary Class Sizes) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 (SSI 2010/326).
